markdown:
<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Elemental, Fire](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=410)</title>

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 144 <sup>1.1</sup>

Fire elementals are destructive manifestations of the scorching [Plane of Fire](/Planes.aspx?ID=31). Although most fire elementals revel in the chance to experience new kinds of fires away from their home plane, even the most considerate fire elemental can be a danger to humanoids and their property. 

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Cinder Rat](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2981) (Creature 3), [Elemental Inferno](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2984) (Creature 11), [Firewyrm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2983) (Creature 9), [Living Wildfire](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2982) (Creature 5)

<title level="2" right="Creature Family Group">Elemental</title>

**Related Families**
[Elemental, Air](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=41), [Elemental, Air](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=408), [Elemental, Earth](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=42), [Elemental, Earth](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=409), [Elemental, Fire](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=43), [Elemental, Mephit](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=44), [Elemental, Metal](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=343), [Elemental, Scamp](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=411), [Elemental, Water](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=45), [Elemental, Water](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=412), [Elemental, Wisp](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=232), [Elemental, Wood](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=345)
name: Elemental, Fire
